p: HT29 and SW620 colorectal cancer cell lines and HFF-1 fibroblast (ATCC, Rockville, USA) were used. HT29 cells were cultured and maintained in Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle’s Medium (DMEM) (GIBCO, by Thermo Fischer Scientific, NY, USA) supplemented with 10% foetal bovine serum (FBS), 100 units/mL penicillin, and 100 µg streptomycin. SW620 and HFF-1 cells were cultured in Roswell Park Memorial Institute medium (RPMI-1640) (GIBCO, by Thermo scientific, NY, USA) supplemented with 10% FBS and 1% penicillin and streptomycin (Napolitano et al., 2015). All cultures were incubated at 37 °C and humidified atmosphere of 5% CO 2.
